channel.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
channel.description:
[url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=DFWCmPos7TM&feature=related#movie_player']New Trailer[/url]
Seriously, cutscenes and story look good. Really good.
But goddamn it, why do the gameplay and retarded units have to be shit?
I think this game will be good and terrible at the same time. =/

item.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
item.dc:creator: EvilGoodGuy
item.description:
I own and love all the C&C games and have been a player and a fan since the beginning. With the exception of Generals… I never liked that one for some reason.
But I gotta say I’m extremely disappointed with C&C4… C&C3 took things in a different direction… removing traditional aspects and adding new ones… which was okay for the most part, but still made a great game and addition to the series. But I’ve played the C&C4 beta and feel like the series has been ruined.
EA said they are trying to appeal to the new gen of gamers with C&C4… but I still don’t see why that requires them to completely remake the structure of the series. It’s completely possible to enhance the gameplay of C&C and add new content without making the enormous changes they have.
Honestly, I’m not going to purchase this game. I will probably just rip off the copy my brother pre-ordered so I can see the cutscenes and finish the saga.

Read full topic
item.source: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted

item.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
item.dc:creator: EZcube
item.description:
They also made capturing buildings a chore by implementing a population cap system replacing the "engineer goes inside and takes over the entire building ".

It doesn’t feel like CnC anymore…

Read full topic
item.source: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted

item.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
item.dc:creator: dky.tehkingd.u
item.description:
As part of the C&C4 Beta since it was still a private Beta, I can safely say that the current iteration is MUCH more fun than it was before.

Kinda says something about the version I started off with.

Either way, I’m gonna get it at least for the cutscenes. If anything, C&C is pretty well-known for its story, and in that case Youtube doesn’t really cut it. It’ll be pretty awesome to see the story conclude in-context (even with the meh gameplay).

In fact, Sam Bass even promised us that if we don’t end up liking his story, we would be allowed to flame his email.

By the way, the new C&C motion comic is showing to be promising.

Read full topic

item.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
item.dc:creator: Jingles
item.description:
I never knew they removed base building… that is the whole aim of the game! Build a base, make weapons/troops, pwn peeps.

I think that C&C3 was actually quite good compared to what others say, I don’t really see what is wrong with it.

Read full topic
item.source: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted

item.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Winged One:

I agree that the no resource or base building is complete bullshit. Seriously, what the fuck EA? Why the hell remove two iconic features that series nearly established?

EA thought it was too complicated for beginners…

Read full topic
item.source: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted

item.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
item.dc:creator: Winged_One
item.description:
I agree that the no resource or base building is complete bullshit. Seriously, what the fuck EA? Why the hell remove two iconic features that series nearly established?

But I still want to see how the story plays out. I don’t know. I’ll probably just download it, play through once, and forget about it. It won’t be a masterpiece I’d like to play again like, say, TS.

Read full topic

item.source: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted

item.title: New Tiberium Twilight Trailer = Me Being Conflicted
item.dc:creator: Mont_Blanc
item.description:
Lord Grievous:

They’ve butchered everything C&C with this game, they’d already screwed up with C&C3 (though it still had some good points) and now it looks like a cross between Dawn of War and Halo Wars with the C&C title on the box :meh:

Totally my opinion too.

Winged One:

Yeah, the actual gameplay is gonna be sucky. But the cutscenes and supposed story could be worse. At least you now feel like a part of the FMVs, rather than a floating static TV.

Though I HOPE TO GOD Klepacki makes a return. But if he does, he needs to produce DECENT MUSIC. I still can’t tell if he was trying to suck to fit in with the rest of RA3.

Klepacki doesn’t return in this one either. Prepare for real shit with this one

Read full topic

And I don’t think we can really compare Klepacki in RA3 to TS, RA1, RA2, or CNC1. Seriously, I want funky rhythms and shit.
